samples.question: Has your preference for colors changed over time?
samples.transcript: Let me think. Well, I have liked red as far as I can remember.
samples.transcript_original: Hmm, let me think. Well, I have liked red as far as I can remember.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Let me think. Well, I have liked red as far as I can remember.

samples.question: If you bought a new car, what color would you choose and why?
samples.transcript: Given the chance to purchase a new vehicle, I would really love to buy a red Jeep Wrangler because I really like this car and I can go on adventure with it and it would be easy to find in a parking lot. That is the end of part one. We will now continue with part two.
samples.transcript_original: Given the chance to purchase a new vehicle, I would really love to buy a red Jeep Wrangler because I really like this car and I can go on adventure with it and it would be easy to find in a parking lot. That is the end of part one. We will now continue with part two.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Given the chance to purchase a new vehicle, I would really love to buy a red Jeep Wrangler because I really like this car and I can go on adventure with it and it would be easy to find in a parking lot.

samples.question: Do you use a wallet?
samples.transcript: So I always carry a physical wallet which has my ID, driver's license, and some cash with me whenever I am out. Besides that, I also have a digital wallet which helps me make payments for my online transactions. Transactions easier and quicker.
samples.transcript_original: Um, so I always carry a physical wallet which has my ID, driver's license, and some cash with me whenever I'm out. Besides that, I also have a digital wallet which helps me make payments for my online transactions. Transactions easier and quicker.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I always carry a physical wallet which has my ID, driver's license, and some cash with me whenever I am out. Besides that, I also have a digital wallet which helps me make payments for my online transactions. Transactions easier and quicker.

samples.question: Have you ever lost a wallet?
samples.transcript: Yes, and that was a very unfortunate story. so I remember I was in 10th grade, I think. I was at this bubble tea shop and, when I left, I totally forgot about my wallet. five minutes later, I suddenly remembered, about it and I came back to the shop to, to ask about the wallet. it was nowhere to be found. thank God I did not lose much money, but it was such a hassle to just go through all of the paperwork again for my ID card.

samples.question: Have you ever sent a wallet to someone as a gift?
samples.transcript: Yes. So, last year I underwent a course for, national defense and security, education at this, military school. our unit was under guidance. We had three very nice and friendly guys. And towards the end of the course, we all chipped in and bought each of them a wallet. We were very glad that they all liked the presents.

samples.question: Do Vietnamese people like barbecue?
samples.transcript: Absolutely. so barbecue, specifically Korean barbecue, has been all the rage in Vietnam in the past few years as numerous Korean restaurants have opened in the country. nowadays, these barbecue restaurants are always teeming with Vietnamese foodies who look for some good quality beef.
samples.transcript_original: Absolutely. Um, so barbecue, specifically Korean barbecue, has been all the rage in Vietnam in the past few years as numerous Korean restaurants have opened in the country. Um, nowadays, these barbecue restaurants are always teeming with Vietnamese foodies who look for some good quality beef.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Absolutely. so barbecue, specifically Korean barbecue, has been all the rage in Vietnam in the past few years as numerous Korean restaurants have opened in the country. nowadays, these barbecue restaurants are always teeming with Vietnamese foodies who look for some good quality beef.

samples.question: What kinds of food do you like to eat for barbecue?
samples.transcript: I really like Korean barbecue so I always make I always make wraps from veggies like lettuce and this really unique leaves called kenyip in Korean And of course the meat is in the middle of the wrap I also dip it in a thing called samjang which is a condiment made from chili sauce soybean based and other ingredients I thinking about it just makes my mouth water Did you have barbecue when you were a child? yes, but not very often. I was not from a well-off family, so we did not have much money to splurge on barbecue. But, yeah, we only had it every once in a while when there are, you know, birthdays and celebrations, stuff like that.

Um, yes, but not very often. Um, I was not from a well-off family, so we didn't have much money to splurge on barbecue. samples.question: Do you like to wear special costumes?
samples.transcript: Not really. I, you know, when putting on this kind of clothing, you are going to, draw people's attention. And I am the kind of person who resent being the center of attention, so wearing special costumes is not really my kind of thing.
samples.transcript_original: Um, not really. I, you know, when putting on this kind of clothing, you're gonna, uh, draw people's attention. And I'm the kind of person who resent being the center of attention, um, so wearing special costumes isn't really my kind of thing.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Not really. I, you know, when putting on this kind of clothing, you are going to, draw people's attention. And I am the kind of person who resent being the center of attention, so wearing special costumes is not really my kind of thing.

samples.question: Did you try any special costumes when you were young?
samples.transcript: Oh yeah, I almost forgot that I did. it was in seventh grade, I think. We had a Cinderella play, and I played one of the three rats that helped the main character. I had to wear this, ridiculous costume that was supposed to make me look like a rat. at the time I completely loathed it because it made me look like an idiot, but in hindsight it was a pretty fun experience.

Um, at the time I completely loathed it because it made me look like an idiot, but in hindsight it was a pretty fun experience.

samples.question: When was the last time you wore special costumes?
samples.transcript: I think that that time in seventh grade was, when I played the rat was the first and also the last time that I wore that kind of clothing. And ever since then, I do not think I have ever had any other chance of putting on costumes.

samples.question: Why are detective stories attractive to people?
samples.transcript: I think it is the elements of mystery that draw, draw in people to detective stories. You know, there are always so many unanswered questions that enable to, and that enables people to, to use their imagination and come up with different scenarios and solutions to, solve the mysteries. And the level of suspense is also another factor that makes detective stories very appealing. You know, people look forward to seeing how everything pan out at the end of the story.
samples.transcript_original: Um, I think it's the elements of mystery that draw, draw in people to detective stories. You know, there are always so many unanswered questions that enable to, uh, and that enables people to, um, to use their imagination and come up with different scenarios and solutions to, uh, solve the mysteries. And the level of suspense is also another factor that makes detective stories very appealing. You know, people look forward to seeing how everything pan out at the end of the story.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I think it is the elements of mystery that draw, draw in people to detective stories. You know, there are always so many unanswered questions that enable to, and that enables people to, to use their imagination and come up with different scenarios and solutions to, solve the mysteries. And the level of suspense is also another factor that makes detective stories very appealing. You know, people look forward to seeing how everything pan out at the end of the story.

samples.question: Which do you think is better, a detective movie or its original novel?
samples.transcript: Well, I am a massive fan of books and normally I prefer novels to movie adaptations.
samples.transcript_original: Well, I am a massive fan of books and normally I prefer um, novels to movie adaptations.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I am a massive fan of books and normally I prefer novels to movie adaptations.

samples.question: However, for detective stories I would have to choose the movies.
samples.transcript: I do not know what, I do not really know why but whenever I pick up a mystery and detective book, I just feel super bored and, and gave And give up halfway through the story most of the time. And in contrast, when I watch a movie of this genre, it is always very exhilarating. Thank you.
samples.transcript_original: I don't know what, I don't really know why but whenever I pick up a mystery and detective book, I just feel super bored and, and gave And give up halfway through the story most of the time. And in contrast, when I watch a movie of this genre, it's always very exhilarating. Thank you,.

samples.question: What is your first name please?
samples.transcript: Saskia. Thanks Saskia. At the beginning of the IELTS test you will be required to provide some ID but as this is a practice test we do not need to do that today. So I want to begin by talking about you.
